sentences.sContent: She was afraid she wouldn’t be able to bear the pain.
sentences.sCn: 她恐怕自己忍受不了这种痛苦。

sentences.sContent: Overcrowding makes prison life even harder to bear.
sentences.sCn: 过度拥挤使监狱生活更加难以忍受。

sentences.sContent: Make the water as hot as you can bear .
sentences.sCn: 把水温调到你能忍受的最高温度。

sentences.sContent: The humiliation was more than he could bear .
sentences.sCn: 这样的羞辱是他万万不能忍受的。

sentences.sContent: Black people continue to bear the brunt of most racial violence (=  have to deal with the most difficult or damaging part  ) .
sentences.sCn: 在大多数种族暴力事件中，黑人仍然是首当其冲的受害群体。

sentences.sContent: Passengers could be insulting, and stewardesses just had to grin and bear it (=  accept it without complaining  ) .
sentences.sCn: 乘客有时会破口大骂，而乘务员只能微笑着默默忍受。

sentences.sContent: Experts were worried the financial system would not be able to bear the strain .
sentences.sCn: 专家担心现行金融体系承受不了这样的压力。
